title: Update Join button to redirect to Google Form

requirements.summary: Remove the 'coming soon' alert from the Join button in WaitlistCTA component
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Join button no longer triggers any alert
No 'coming soon' text appears when the button is clicked

file_operations.description: Remove the alert handler from the Join button's onClick event. Delete any alert() or window.alert() calls that display 'coming soon' messaging when the button is clicked.

requirements.summary: Make the Join button redirect to Google Form URL when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Join button opens https://forms.gle/nD95mzMCvfRbBFZV7 in a new tab
The redirect happens immediately on button click
The original page remains open while the form opens in a new tab

file_operations.description: Update the Join button's onClick handler to open https://forms.gle/nD95mzMCvfRbBFZV7 in a new tab using window.open() with '_blank' target. Ensure existing button styling, animations, and glow effects are preserved.
